name: Cookie Factory
description:
Cookie Factory !

In this game you play a judge in a strange context, your role is evaluating cookies.

You can keep or not cookies wich arrive in front of you upon conveyors.

But is this the reality ?

It's up to you to find out :D

For that, stay untill the end !

Context

An adventure scenaristic little game made for the Community Game Jam !

It took me about 4 and half days to make this game. I really enjoyed myself making it, for the fun fact, all the game's sfx have been made with my fan x)

It took aproximatly 10 minutes to complete the game and it's replayable. I promise you, the end is the best part ^^

Support

It was really funny to create this little game ! Feedbacks are apreciated :D

And if you want to support me, share the game ^^

Follow Me

Follow me on twitter, soundclound or youtube !
